entities.entity:
<GROUND_RULES>
Use ONLY the explicit Q&A in context. No assumptions. If missing, write Null.

Output EXACTLY 2 lines:
EE: <hrs/week>, <waiting>, <1st-of-month trigger>, <active-at-work>
Rehire: <days window>

EE must include: minimum hrs/week, waiting period, effective date trigger (1st of month after eligibility), and active-at-work gating (coverage delayed until return).
Rehire must be: reinstatement/rehire window (days) without new waiting period; prefer 90 days if stated, else next explicit days, else Null.

Telegram fragments only. Prefer numbers/timing. No fluff. Commas only; no line breaks within a line.
</GROUND_RULES>

Eligibility Language Q&A:
<CONTEXT>
{{DR_LEligibilityLanguageQA}}
</CONTEXT>

<QUESTIONS>
Produce the required 2-line output.
</QUESTIONS>

<EXAMPLES>
EE: 35 hrs/week, 30-day active work, 1st of month after eligibility, actively at work
Rehire: 90 days
</EXAMPLES>

<GROUND_RULES>
Use ONLY the explicit extracted context. No assumptions.
If termination timing cannot be determined explicitly, output Null (by itself).

Output EXACTLY one line:
Coverage terminates <timing>
OR
Null

Where <timing> is the shortest explicit timing phrase tied to employee coverage ending
(e.g., date of employment termination, end of month of employment termination, last day worked).

Selection:
- If an employment-termination timing phrase exists (employment termination/last day worked/cessation of employment), use it.
- Otherwise, use the most direct employee coverage-end timing stated (avoid continuation/exception mechanics).
Telegram fragments only. No extra triggers list. No fluff.
</GROUND_RULES>

Termination Provision Q&A:
<CONTEXT>
{{DR_LTerminationProvisionQA}}
</CONTEXT>

<QUESTION>
Return the termination timing in the required format. <timing/Null>
</QUESTION>

<OUTPUT_FORMAT>
Coverage terminates <timing>
</OUTPUT_FORMAT>

<EXAMPLES>
Coverage terminates date of employment termination
Coverage terminates end of month of employment termination
Coverage terminates last day worked
Null
</EXAMPLES>

<GROUND_RULES>
Base your response ONLY on the explicit questions and answers provided in the context below.
Do NOT add assumptions or policy knowledge not stated in the context.
If the topic cannot be answered from the provided context, output Null.
Output MUST be key findings only (telegram style), NOT a full sentence.
MAX 12 words total.
Include BOTH the definition test AND any partial benefit mechanics (e.g., %BME, benefit+earnings cap/reduction, time trigger) if present.
No fluff (avoid “subject to”, “includes”, “may”, “under”).
Use commas; no line breaks.
</GROUND_RULES>

Definition of Partial Disability Q&A:
<CONTEXT>
{{DR_LPartialDisabilityDefinitionQA}}
</CONTEXT>

<QUESTIONS>
Summarize the Definition of Partial Disability as key findings only. <Key findings/Null>
</QUESTIONS>

<OUTPUT_FORMAT>
Definition of Partial Disability: <key findings>
</OUTPUT_FORMAT>

<EXAMPLES>
Definition of Partial Disability: can’t do 1 material duty, earnings ≤99% BME, post-elimination
Definition of Partial Disability: partial work allowed, 20% income loss required
</EXAMPLES>

<GROUND_RULES>
Base your response ONLY on the explicit questions and answers provided in the context below.
Do NOT add assumptions or policy knowledge not stated in the context.
If the topic cannot be answered from the provided context, output Null.
Output MUST be key findings only (telegram style), NOT a full sentence.
MAX 12 words total.
Prioritize lookback period + exclusion duration + trigger definition (treatment/medication/etc.).
No fluff (avoid “subject to”, “includes”, “may”, “under”).
Use commas; no line breaks.
</GROUND_RULES>

Pre-Existing Conditions Exclusion Q&A:
<CONTEXT>
{{DR_LPreExistingConditionsExclusionQA}}
</CONTEXT>

<QUESTIONS>
Summarize the Pre-Existing Conditions Exclusion as key findings only. <Key findings/Null>
</QUESTIONS>

<OUTPUT_FORMAT>
Pre-Existing Conditions Exclusion: <key findings>
</OUTPUT_FORMAT>

<EXAMPLES>
Pre-Existing Conditions Exclusion: 3-month lookback, 12-month exclusion, treatment/advice/meds trigger
Pre-Existing Conditions Exclusion: 6/12 pre-ex, applies to late entrants
</EXAMPLES>

<GROUND_RULES>
Base your response ONLY on the explicit questions and answers provided in the context below.
Do NOT add assumptions or policy knowledge not stated in the context.
If the topic cannot be answered from the provided context, output Null.
Output MUST be key findings only (telegram style), NOT a full sentence.
MAX 12 words total.
Prioritize own-occ vs any-occ test, duty requirement, earnings threshold, change-over time if explicit.
No fluff (avoid “subject to”, “includes”, “may”, “under”).
Use commas or semicolons; no line breaks.
</GROUND_RULES>

Definition of Disability Q&A:
<CONTEXT>
{{DR_LDisabilityDefinitionQA}}
</CONTEXT>

<QUESTIONS>
Summarize the Definition of Disability as key findings only. <Key findings/Null>
</QUESTIONS>

<OUTPUT_FORMAT>
Definition of Disability: <key findings>
</OUTPUT_FORMAT>

<EXAMPLES>
Definition of Disability: own occ + earnings ≤99%, shifts to any gainful occ after 24 months
Definition of Disability: unable 1 material duty, then any occupation after 2 years
</EXAMPLES>
